      • getOptions

        private boolean getOptions​(GameState state)
        Fills the plantedCropsSet with player's planted crops (no repetition of crop types). Uses plantedCropsSet to fill cropOptions string.
        Parameters:
        state - the current GameState
        Returns:
        whether player has planted crops

      • useCropItem

        private void useCropItem​(GameState state,
                         java.lang.String itemName)
        Checks whether selected crop item is available. If item is available, item boosts are applied to crops and item is removed from player's cropItems list. If item is unavailable, a warning message is printed.
        Parameters:
        state - the current GameState
        itemName - the selected item (String)

      • useGenericItem

        private void useGenericItem​(GameState state,
                            java.lang.String itemName)
        Handles use of selected item if it is a generic item (not sold at Shop).
        Parameters:
        state - the current GameState
        itemName - the selected item (String)

      • useItem

        private void useItem​(GameState state,
                     int boost,
                     int growthBoost)
        Handles use of selected item if it is a crop item.
        Parameters:
        state - the current GameState
        boost - the selected item's general boost
        growthBoost - the selected item's growth boost

      • waterCrops

        private void waterCrops​(GameState state)
        Handles case that water is selected item. Waters all crops.
        Parameters:
        state - the current GameState
